last_episode_to_air.name: Skipper
last_episode_to_air.overview: With the aid of a Quantum Skipper, Rimmer leaves the Red Dwarf to travel the multiverse in search of a dimension where he isn't such a loser.

name: Red Dwarf
overview: The adventures of the last human alive and his friends, stranded three million years into deep space on the mining ship Red Dwarf.

seasons.name: Series X
seasons.overview: Red Dwarf X, the tenth series of the British science fiction sitcom Red Dwarf, was broadcast on UK television channel Dave between 4 October 2012 and 8 November 2012. There are six episodes and it is the first full series of Red Dwarf since 1999.

episodes.name: The End
episodes.overview: Dave Lister emerges from 3 million years of suspended animation to find that he's the only surviving crew member of the Red Dwarf.

episodes.name: Future Echoes
episodes.overview: The members of the Red Dwarf crew get a glimpse of their respective futures when the ship goes into light speed, and time begins to dilate.

episodes.name: Balance of Power
episodes.overview: Fed up with Rimmer always pulling rank, Lister decides to take the chef's exam to become his superior -- which doesn't sit well with Rimmer.

episodes.name: Waiting for God
episodes.overview: When Holly, the ship's computer, reports a mysterious pod floating in space, Rimmer insists on capturing the capsule.

episodes.name: Confidence & Paranoia
episodes.overview: Plagued by a nasty case of space pneumonia, Lister begins to hallucinate.

episodes.name: Me²
episodes.overview: Tired of sharing space with Lister, Rimmer begins a blissful new relationship with the ultimate roommate: a holographic replica of himself.

episodes.name: Kryten
episodes.overview: A distress signal draws the ship's crew to the site of a space shuttle crash.

episodes.name: Better Than Life
episodes.overview: Rimmer learns that his father has passed away but isn't sure which is sadder: his father's death or that he is now encumbered with an £8,500 tax bill.

episodes.name: Thanks for the Memory
episodes.overview: When Lister awakens after a night of revelry, he's at a loss to explain how he and Cat broke their legs.

episodes.name: Stasis Leak
episodes.overview: A wrinkle in time takes the crew 3 million years into the past, before the radiation leak killed everyone aboard except Lister.

episodes.name: Queeg
episodes.overview: With Holly on the fritz, the ship's backup computer, Queeg 500, steps in to command the Red Dwarf and its crew of misfits.

episodes.name: Parallel Universe
episodes.overview: After testing Holly's latest invention, the crew ends up in a parallel universe where they encounter opposite versions of themselves.

episodes.name: Backwards
episodes.overview: The crew undergoes some major changes in the season opener as Lister prepares to give birth to twins.

episodes.name: Marooned
episodes.overview: As the Red Dwarf approaches a minefield of black holes, the crew must evacuate, throwing Lister and Rimmer together on a frozen planet.

episodes.name: Polymorph
episodes.overview: Terror reigns on the Red Dwarf when a shape-shifting genetic mutant climbs aboard and subjects the crew to its menacing slobber.

episodes.name: Bodyswap
episodes.overview: When a haywire scutter meddles with the circuitry on the Red Dwarf, Lister accidentally throws the ship into self-destruct mode.

episodes.name: Timeslides
episodes.overview: Kryten's discovery of a liquid that transforms photographs into interactive portals sends the Red Dwarf crew on a series of misadventures.

episodes.name: The Last Day
episodes.overview: When the Red Dwarf crew learns that Kryten has only 24 hours left to live, they band together to give the android the best night of his life.

episodes.name: Camille
episodes.overview: After bucking an order, Kryten meets his match while investigating a distress call from Camille -- a female version of himself.

episodes.name: D.N.A.
episodes.overview: While investigating an abandoned alien vessel adrift in space, the crew discovers a device that can change organic life by altering an object's DNA.

episodes.name: Justice
episodes.overview: Not knowing if the stasis pod they've found contains a security guard or a homicidal criminal, the crew heads to the capsule's initial destination.

episodes.name: White Hole
episodes.overview: Kryten's attempts to restore Holly's IQ to genius level inadvertently cause the Red Dwarf to shut down its support systems.

episodes.name: Dimension Jump
episodes.overview: After Rimmer comes face-to-face with his alter ego, the craven hologram decides he can't stand the sight of his counterpart.

episodes.name: Meltdown
episodes.overview: When a matter transporter sends the crew to a theme park populated by wax androids that have overridden their programming, they get ensnared in a war.

episodes.name: Holoship
episodes.overview: Rimmer is beamed aboard the computer-generated ship Enlightenment and finds that all his wildest dreams have come true.

episodes.name: The Inquisitor
episodes.overview: The crew crosses paths with a dark figure who calls himself the Inquisitor.

episodes.name: Terrorform
episodes.overview: After being captured by a "psy-moon," Rimmer becomes a prisoner of his own thoughts.

episodes.name: Quarantine
episodes.overview: When the crew goes exploring on a snowy planet, they cross paths with a hologram scientist infected with a nasty virus.

episodes.name: Demons & Angels
episodes.overview: Lister and Kryten inadvertently blow up the Red Dwarf with a new invention that makes two copies of any object.

episodes.name: Back to Reality
episodes.overview: While exploring an ocean planet, Lister, Kryten, Rimmer and Cat discover an abandoned ship whose entire crew committed suicide.

episodes.name: Psirens
episodes.overview: After realizing that the Red Dwarf has been stolen, Lister, Rimmer, Kryten and Cat go looking for the missing ship.

episodes.name: Legion
episodes.overview: With the Starbug running low on supplies, the crew goes hunting for rations and finds an abandoned spaceship with a wish-granting being on board.

episodes.name: Gunmen of the Apocalypse
episodes.overview: The crew heads to the Wild West when Kryten contracts a deadly computer virus.

episodes.name: Emohawk: Polymorph II
episodes.overview: When the Starbug crashes on a planet inhabited by a devastatingly ugly GELF tribe, Lister is forced to marry the chief's homely daughter.

episodes.name: Rimmerworld
episodes.overview: Rimmer finds himself on a strange planet where the only other inhabitants are the clones he's made of himself.

episodes.name: Out of Time
episodes.overview: After experimenting with an abandoned time drive, the crew of the Red Dwarf comes face-to-face with an exact replica of the ship.

episodes.name: Tikka to Ride
episodes.overview: The crew goes back in time to get food but inadvertently lands in Dallas on Nov. 22, 1963, the day President Kennedy was assassinated.

episodes.name: Stoke Me a Clipper
episodes.overview: Ace Rimmer -- Rimmer's charming alter ego from another reality -- revisits the crew to ask Rimmer an important favor.

episodes.name: Ouroboros
episodes.overview: The Red Dwarfers pick up a new crew member -- Lister's old flame, Kristine Kochanski -- when they encounter a wormhole.

episodes.name: Duct Soup
episodes.overview: Fearing he'll someday be replaced by Kristine Kochanski, a jealous Kryten "accidentally" shuts down the Starbug's engine.

episodes.name: Blue
episodes.overview: Lister is conflicted when he discovers that he actually misses Rimmer, who's been away protecting the universe for far too long.

episodes.name: Beyond a Joke
episodes.overview: The crew reluctantly explores the works of Jane Austen when Kristine Kochanski takes them on a virtual reality tour of Pride and Prejudice World.

episodes.name: Epideme
episodes.overview: After being seduced by a 3-million-year-old corpse, Lister discovers he's contracted a deadly STD.

episodes.name: Nanarchy
episodes.overview: After losing his arm in a battle with the Epideme virus, Lister enlists the help of nanobots to reconstruct his mangled body.

episodes.name: Back in the Red (1)
episodes.overview: Thanks to the nanobots, the Red Dwarf is back in business with its original crew on board, which means Rimmer is alive and well.

episodes.name: Back in the Red (2)
episodes.overview: Armed with a stash of confidential files, Rimmer proceeds to brown-nose Capt. Hollister in hopes of receiving officer status.

episodes.name: Back in the Red (3)
episodes.overview: After being slapped with a two-year prison sentence for committing crimes against the Space Corps, the Red Dwarfers are desperate to escape.

episodes.name: Cassandra
episodes.overview: Lister thinks he's signing the gang up to sing in a prison choir but learns that he's enlisted them in an army of convicts used for suicide missions.

episodes.name: Krytie TV
episodes.overview: After being cornered and reprogrammed by restless, sex-starved prisoners, Kryten launches his own television station called Krytie TV.

episodes.name: Pete (1)
episodes.overview: After infecting the prison guards' basketball team with a sexual-enhancement virus, Lister and Rimmer are sent to the hole.

episodes.name: Pete (2)
episodes.overview: In an attempt to bring Pete the sparrow back to life, the Red Dwarfers inadvertently cause him to devolve into a tyrannosaur that stalks the ship.

episodes.name: Only the Good...
episodes.overview: The series concludes as a mysterious life form invades the Red Dwarf courtesy of an escape pod and starts eating away at the ship.

episodes.name: Back to Earth (1)
episodes.overview: Nine years later the Red Dwarf crew are older but still none the wiser. Lister's busy day of annoying Rimmer is interrupted by the discovery of a dimension-hopping leviathan in the ship's mile-deep water tank.

episodes.name: Back to Earth (2)
episodes.overview: Rimmer's replacement, Katerina, is determined to guide Lister back to his home planet. But Earth in 2009 is not everything the boys had expected, and Rimmer has no intention of being replaced.

episodes.name: Back to Earth (3)
episodes.overview: When Lister's busy day of annoying Rimmer was interrupted by the discovery of a dimension-hopping leviathan in the ship's mile-deep water tank, transporting the crew back to Earth, all Lister's dreams appear to be coming true.

episodes.name: Trojan
episodes.overview: The Dwarfers' mining ship is still creaking though the wastelands of unchartered deep space, but the posse soon stumble upon the mysteriously abandoned SS Trojan. As they inspect the ship Rimmer receives an SOS distress call from an old foe, and is suddenly faced with the dilemma of his life.

guest_stars.character: All Droid Jayne / Phone Droid Voice
guest_stars.name: Lucy Newman-Williams

guest_stars.character: All Droid Bob / Phone Droid Voice
guest_stars.name: Bryan Bounds

episodes.name: Fathers and Suns
episodes.overview: Lister grapples with the problem of being his own father.

episodes.name: Lemons
episodes.overview: The posse find themselves marooned in 23 AD where they rescue a famous historical figure with a beard.

guest_stars.character: Man Who May Be Jesus & Judas
guest_stars.name: Tom Pepper

episodes.name: Entangled
episodes.overview: Kryten and Cat become quantum entangled forcing them to do everything in unison.

episodes.name: Dear Dave
episodes.overview: Lister gets involved in a love triangle with snack dispensers 23 and 34.

episodes.name: The Beginning
episodes.overview: The series final episode finds the boys surrounded by a Simulant War Cruiser and its fleet of attack ships. Armed with only two forks and a pencil sharpener, the Dwarfers begin to wonder whether this is the beginning of the end. Only one man can save them. Unfortunately that man is Arnold J Rimmer.

10.name: Series X
10.overview: Red Dwarf X, the tenth series of the British science fiction sitcom Red Dwarf, was broadcast on UK television channel Dave between 4 October 2012 and 8 November 2012. There are six episodes and it is the first full series of Red Dwarf since 1999.

episodes.name: Twentica
episodes.overview: The Dwarfers find themselves in an alternative version of America where modern technology is prohibited, making Rimmer and Kryten illegal. The Dwarfers infiltrate the tech savvy underground and try to bring down the authoritarian regime.

episodes.name: Samsara
episodes.overview: When the Dwarfers investigate a crashed ship at the bottom of an ocean moon, Lister and Cat become trapped together and Lister's nightmare begins. Meantime Rimmer and Kryten discover the ship is controlled by a dark force.

episodes.name: Give and Take
episodes.overview: After an altercation with a deranged droid Lister has his kidneys organ-napped. The only solution is to ask Cat, the most selfish creature in the universe, to give him one of his.

episodes.name: Officer Rimmer
episodes.overview: After a scandalous piece of good fortune Rimmer saves the life of a bio-printed Captain and is promoted, fulfilling his life-long dream of becoming an Officer. He immediately opens an Officer's club, which is out of bounds to the lower orders, and uses the bio-printer to fill it with versions of himself.

episodes.name: Krysis
episodes.overview: Kryten has a mid-life crisis and changes his body cover from Mech grey to Ferrari red. The posse try and show him how much he's achieved in life by taking him to visit a mechanoid from his old fleet.

episodes.name: Can of Worms
episodes.overview: Cat takes time off from being in love with himself to fall head over heels in love with a lady Cat with a big secret.

episodes.name: Cured
episodes.overview: The crew stumble on a science centre where vile historical figures have been 'cured' of evil.

episodes.name: Siliconia
episodes.overview: A ship full of rogue androids who broke their programming want to help Kryten do the same. The M.I.L.F can only spell trouble for the remainder of the crew.

episodes.name: Timewave
episodes.overview: The boys from the Dwarf discover a ship where all forms of criticism are illegal.

episodes.name: Mechocracy
episodes.overview: The machines of Red Dwarf go on strike. Kryten and Rimmer campaign against each other for their votes in an election to represent them.

episodes.name: M-Corp
episodes.overview: A long overdue software update spells trouble for the crew when they discover that the Jupiter Mining Corp has been sold!

episodes.name: Skipper
episodes.overview: With the aid of a Quantum Skipper, Rimmer leaves the Red Dwarf to travel the multiverse in search of a dimension where he isn't such a loser.
